name: Driver license: scanner, reader, decode, get info
description: First Ever Driver License Scanner Pro Turn your android into effective Scanner and reader any DMV or International Driving license. Its first ever driver license scanner for android. It allows you to read hidden information of your DMV driver license. Extract all hidden info from PDF417 Driver license code. You can also read and scan your international Driver license. The fast and quick scanner gives all information without server round up, its works completely offline.  This Driving license scanner efficiently scans your license.  Gallery Image If you have image of your driver license then dont worry! you can use gallery scan feature and get all information on your Android screen.   Share    Do you want to share license scanned result with someone? Don Worry! Now you can share scan data easily either as image or text.   Within second you will find many informations including but not limited to:  Personal info  Name  Address  Eye Color  Height  Weight  License number  Restriction code  Driver license revision date  Driver license expiry date  Donor info  Country   Its feature including:  Flashlight support for low light environment  Auto focus  Scan history manage  Runtime Scan  Easy to use  User friendly  Attractive user interface  Share as text & image   Three step use application:  Simply open application  keep driver license close to it  Its done Now all information is available for you.  Note: You can download pro version of this application from here:  Driver License Scanner Pro:  https://market.android.com/details?id=com.mr3h4n.driver_license_scanner_pro
